# snapcd_module_terraform_array_flag (Resource)

Manages a Module Terraform Array Flag in Snap CD.


## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "snapcd_module_terraform_array_flag" "targets" {
  for_each  = toset(["aws_vpc.main", "aws_subnet.main"])
  module_id = snapcd_module.mymodule.id
  task      = "Plan"
  flag      = "Target"
  value     = each.value
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `flag` (String) The Terraform CLI array flag name.
- `module_id` (String) ID of the parent Module.
- `task` (String) The command task this flag applies to. Valid values: `Init`, `Plan`, `Apply`, `Destroy`, `Output`.
- `value` (String) The value for the flag.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique ID of the Module Terraform Array Flag.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
terraform import snapcd_module_terraform_array_flag.target_vpc "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"
```
